synopsis: PxInt_t PxStrncmp(char const *s, char const *s2, PxSize_t n);

arguments.name: n
arguments.description: Maximal count of characters in strings to compare

retValues: 1 if s1 is lexicographically greater then s2
-1 if s2 is lexicographically greater then s1

description.short: Compare two strings with fixed length

long.text: PxStrncmp compare two strings with fixed length. It returns "0", if they are equal.
